Samples.Name: AppMenu
Samples.Description: The AppMenu control is designed to provide a core navigation function to any UWP application that wishes to used the 'Hamburger' menu style.

Samples.Name: DraggableContentControl
Samples.Description: The DraggableContentControl control is designed to allow content to be moved around the screen.

Samples.Name: DrawingCanvas
Samples.Description: The DrawingCanvas control is designed to make it easier to capture drawings from the InkCanvas to a StorageFile.

Samples.Name: Expander
Samples.Description: The Expander control is designed to provide a a way of collapsing and expanding content.

Samples.Name: HeaderedTextBlock
Samples.Description: The HeaderedTextBlock control is designed to provide a header for read-only text. This control is useful for displaying read-only forms.

Samples.Name: Stepper
Samples.Description: The Stepper control provides a user interface for incrementing or decrementing a value.

Samples.Name: ValidatingComboBox
Samples.Description: The ValidatingComboBox control is designed to provide validation for a drop down value when used in a form, for example, a login page.

Samples.Name: ValidatingTextBox
Samples.Description: The ValidatingTextBox control is designed to provide validation to text when used in a form, for example, a login page.

Samples.Name: Color swatches
Samples.Description: This is a set of color swatches which can be used in apps inspired by Google's Material design pattern.

Samples.Name: AppDiagnostics
Samples.Description: The AppDiagnostics helper is designed to make it easier to log information, errors and warnings as well as catch unhandled exceptions all written out to a log file in the local state of the application.

Samples.Name: WindowHelper
Samples.Description: The WindowHelpers are designed to make it easier to launch additional application windows as part of your main application.
